remarks: Transfer ~ nncan -shaped laws to vectors of numbers.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 27-Mar-2015.)
statement:
caonncan.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. V ) $.
caonncan.a $e |- ( ph -> A : I --> S ) $.
caonncan.b $e |- ( ph -> B : I --> S ) $.
caonncan.z $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S ) ) -> ( x M ( x M y ) ) = y ) $.
caonncan $p |- ( ph -> ( A oF M ( A oF M B ) ) = B ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B y $.
$d M x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d ph x y $.
